answers.answer: Hello.It would be helpful if you could mention any other physical illnesses she may be having. The burning sensation she has can have different causes. Some common causes are diabetes, vitamin deficiencies, etc.The neuropathic pain of diabetes usually starts with distal parts, such as the fingers and toes. The neuropathy typically spreads upwards. It will be useful if she is checked for blood sugar levels.You may also consider the symptoms as secondary to underlying depressive disorder. Quite a few women, who are not used to express their emotions, tend to suffer from somatization disorder. The symptoms are real and there is often no cause found by various tests and investigations.Let me know.
